test.name: User should be able to launch flipkart application

kw.name: Open Application
kw.doc: Opens a new application to given Appium server. Capabilities of appium server, Android and iOS, Please check https://github.com/appium/appium/blob/master/docs/en/writing-running-appium/server-args.md | *Option* | *Man.* | *Description* | | remote_url | Yes | Appium server url | | alias | no | alias |

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into the log.

kw.msg: Keyword 'Capture Page Screenshot' could not be run on failure: No application is open

WebDriverException: Message: An unknown server-side error occurred while processing the command. Original error: Cannot start the 'com.flipkart.android' application. Visit https://github.com/appium/appium/blob/master/docs/en/writing-running-appium/android/activity-startup.md for troubleshooting. Original error: 'com.flipkart.android.SplashActivity' or 'com.flipkart.android.com.flipkart.android.SplashActivity' never started. Visit https://github.com/appium/appium/blob/master/docs/en/writing-running-appium/android/activity-startup.md for troubleshooting

kw.name: Select English language and go to home page
Click on menu and select all cetegories
Click on search and search mobiles and scroll till poco is found
Click on POCO and add POCO to cart
Verify if mobile is added to cart
